examples.korean: the king of metals 발음듣기 금. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The table was decorated with gold inlay. 발음듣기 그 탁자는 금으로 상감 장식이 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The table was decorated with gold inlay. 발음

examples.korean: The mirror cracked but did not splinter. 발음듣기 거울이 금이 가기는 했지만 깨지지는 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The mirror cracked but did not splinter. 발음

examples.korean: Check the container for cracks or leaks. 발음듣기 용기에 금이 가거나 새는 곳이 없는지 점검하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Check the container for cracks or leaks. 발음

examples.korean: The ceiling of the cathedral glittered with gold. 발음듣기 그 성당의 천장은 금으로 번쩍번쩍 빛이 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ceiling of the cathedral glittered with gold. 발음
